entry.title: Friday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 24 February 2023
